```{r}
#| label: inspect abstracts
#| output: false
#| message: false

# libs
library(tidyverse)
library(RVerbalExpressions)

# load data
clean_papers <- read_rds("../data/clean_papers.rds")

# define search term
regex_cmc <-
  rx_with_any_case() %>% 
  rx_either_of(
    "internet",
    "cyber",
    "online media",
    "online communication",
    "online social network",
    "online communit",
    "chat",
    "email",
    "computer-mediated",
    "mobile phone",
    "smartphone",
    "instant mess",
    "mobile mess",
    "social media",
    rx() %>% rx_find("social ") %>% rx_find("network") %>% rx_anything(mode = "lazy") %>% rx_find("site") %>% rx_anything(mode = "lazy"),
    "information and communication technolog",
    "facebook",
    "instagram",
    "snapchat",
    "twitter",
    "wechat",
    "weibo",
    "texting")

# define highlighter
highlighter <- 
  list(
    lightgreen = regex_cmc,
    cyan = "(?i)(autonomy)"
    )

# print out nicely formatted abstracts
abstract <- NULL
for (i in 1401:1500) {
  abstract <- c(abstract, knitr::knit_child('../etc/abstract_helper.qmd', quiet = TRUE))
}
```

`r paste(abstract, collapse = '\n')`
